directions: In a medium size mixing bowl, mix together cream cheese, fruit cocktail, and instant pudding mix. Add 1/4 cup almonds, if desired. Shape mixture into a ball, and then roll in the remaining almonds.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans fruit cocktail, drained and chopped fine
1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
title: Fruit Ball
